Changing Text Fonts or Colors

Note: This topic applies to charting in the Windows client only.

In any application chart, you can easily change the fonts and colors used for chart data and text, including labels, titles, and legends.

To change the fonts or colors for chart data or text:

  1. Click the Text Fonts button on the Chart window toolbar. From the menu, select the chart element to be changed.

    • For chart titles, select Left Title, Right Title, Top Title, or Bottom Title.

    • For axis labels, select X Legend or Y Legend.

    • For chart legends, select Legend Box.

    • For slice labels, select Constant Legends.

    • For chart data, select Values Font.

    The Font dialog opens.

  2. Enter or select a font name in the Font text box. The Sample box reflects this and any other changes made in the dialog.

  3. Enter or select a style in the Font Style text box.

  4. Enter or select a point size in the Size text box.

  5. Select or clear the Underline check box to underline or remove underline.

  6. Select or clear the Strikeout check box to insert or remove a strikeout line.

  7. Select a new color from the Color drop-down list box.

  8. Click OK.
